title: Premium Bare land for sale 2.4Mil per Perch (Negotiable)
details: Rare opportunity to own a premium land in a nice and quite neighborhood. There are no similar lands available in this area. Land has a total area of 17.5 Perch and extra free area dedicated for the access road directly from Kawdana main road. Contact + 94-77-6583906 for more details.
